name: mo-ide
author: DFINITY Foundation
description: The official Language Server Protocol (LSP) implementation for Motoko.

scripts.compile:server: mkdir -p ./dist && cp src/mo-ide.js ./dist && cp ../../out/server.js ./dist && cp ../../out/motoko.js ./dist/motoko.js && cp ../../out/wasm_bg.wasm ./dist
scripts.package:zip:linux: cd pkg && mkdir linux && cp mo-ide-linux linux/mo-ide && cd linux && tar -czvf ../mo-ide-linux.tar.gz mo-ide
scripts.package:zip:macos: cd pkg && mkdir macos && cp mo-ide-macos macos/mo-ide && cd macos && tar -czvf ../mo-ide-macos.tar.gz mo-ide
scripts.package:zip:win: cd pkg && mkdir win && cp mo-ide-win.exe win/mo-ide.exe && cd win && zip ../mo-ide-windows.zip mo-ide.exe
